page.title: 14Schools in Barton
page.content: There are three schools in Barton an Infant,a Junior and a High School.The Infant school has about 190 children on roll and 7 staff.An Adventure play area has recently been installed which has tree stumps,swings and climbing frames. The Junior School has 11 staff and about 270 children on roll.One of the attractions of this school is a heated outdoor swimming pool.Children at this school study Maths,English,Science,P.E. Computer Studies,Music and R.E.. The High School has about 70 staff and 1100 children on roll.The children who attend the school come from Barton, Alrewas,Rangemore,Tatenhill,Walton and Yoxall.The school's curriculum is broad and enters many of its pupils for O and A level G.C.E.,C.S.E.and R.S.A.exams. This Community School shares it's buildings with the Adult Education Centre,Library and Youth Centre.
